page.title: 20Local History
page.content: chapel.In the courtyard there is a mosaic coat of arms with 3 Wyverns on it.The words {SEMPER PARATUS,}meaning always prepared.Wyverns are dragon like creatures.They have 2 legs,wings & an arrow shaped point on the end of a long tail.They breathe fire out of their mouths just like dragon & they are covered in scales. The main source of income for the Clifford family is farming, advertising, forestry, fishing & tourism.The grounds by Capability Brown provide delightful walks and a pleasant picnic area.The gardens & walks have been extended,more birds will be on show & there is an adventure playground.Snacks & cream teas are served in the original 18th century stable block.
